alert.note: Alert for Chinle Valley (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued June 18 at 3:03PM MST until June 19 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM TO 8 PM MST SUNDAY DUE TO STRONG WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR NORTHWESTERN APACHE COUNTY... The National Weather Service in Flagstaff has issued a Red Flag Warning due to strong winds and low relative humidity, which is in effect from 10 AM to 8 PM MST Sunday. * AFFECTED AREA...Locations near Chinle and Kayenta. * WINDS...Southwest 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 5 to 10 percent. * IMPACTS...
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring or are imminent. A combination of strong winds and low relative humidities can contribute to extreme fire behavior. Please notify field crews of this Red Flag Warning.
